mapper.insert: insert into tbl_school(school_name, school_code, build_year,type, properties, memo, create_time, update_time) values(#{school_name}, #{school_code}, #{build_year}, #{type}, #{properties}, #{memo}, #{create_time}, #{update_time})
mapper.update: update tbl_school set school_name=#{school_name}, school_code=#{school_code}, build_year=#{build_year}, type=#{type}, properties=#{properties}, memo=#{memo}, update_time=#{update_time} where id=#{id}
